lead_paragraph: The International Olympic Committee advised national Olympic committees on Friday to follow the World Health Organization’s guidance on dealing with the Zika virus in preparation for the Olympics in Rio de Janeiro in August.

abstract: International Olympic Committee recommends national Olympic committees adhere to World Health Organization guidelines regarding Zika virus ahead of 2016 Olympics in Rio de Janeiro.
